Holi High Camp

Bringing cold drinks, hot tunes, and paint cannons to the Playa

Being shot out of a cannon will always be better than being squeezed out of a tube.

Get Blasted Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat | 1 – 4

Four paint cannons shoot water-based neon goodness at your bod.

Drink & Dry

You're stuck with us until the paint dries. Good thing we have a bar.
